title: Software Development Services | Freshcode
keywords: web development services, mobile development services, technology
description: Software, web and mobile development services provided by Frescode: mobile, web and desktop development and technology consulting.
page-title: HOW WE CAN HELP YOU GET TO V. 1.0 AND BEYOND
page-text: Getting your Startup from idea to product market fit is a complex task. Therefore we have build both tools and methods to help - not only getting started but also getting to Version 1. and beyond.
alt: Tablet and a cup of coffee on a table

short_dk.name: Web development
short_dk.text: We create responsive, fast and elegant solutions expertly crafted to suit your business needs using the most efficient technologies like Ruby on Rails, Angular.js, Node.js.

short_dk.name: Dedicated team
short_dk.text: We create a dedicated team for your high priority projects. Each team member boasts specialization and skill set best fitted for your needs to ensure successful and timely development.

short_dk.name: Mobile / Desktop development
short_dk.text: We implement workable solutions for both iOS and Android operation systems and help you build a balanced app with a streamlined design, intuitive interface, and top-notch performance.

short_dk.name: Consulting
short_dk.text: We estimate the time and resources needed, plan the work and choose the best technologies and solutions for your needs. We provide usability analysis, architecture stability, code and UX audits.

short_dk.name: Maintenance
short_dk.text: We perform regular maintenance to prevent system's instability. Our fool-proof backup and recovery options minimize risks of unexpected failures and maximize project's uptime.

short_dk.name: Dedicated team
short_dk.text: We create a dedicated team for your high priority projects. Each team member boasts specialization and skill set best fitted for your needs to ensure successful and timely development.

serv-textes.text: Business Goals are being analysed, understood and validated.
You decide to work with us (or not) based on our feedback and your needs.
Together we setup a roadmap dependant on your need (MVP, v.1, v.2). This roadmap includes tech development, customer validations and market research using our tools.
We begin our work together. Within 30-45 days a working prototype is ready or we will not be paid.
